sourcesContent:
import * as Yup from 'yup'

export const EmployeeValidation = Yup.object().shape({
    fullName: Yup.string()
      .min(2,'too Short!')
      .required('Required'),
    preferredName: Yup.string(),
    birthDate: Yup.date()
      .required('Required'),
    currentStreet1: Yup.string()
      .required('Required'),
    currentCity: Yup.string()
      .required('Required'),
    // currentAddressProof: Yup.required('Required'),
    permanentStreet1: Yup.string()
      .required('Required'),
    permanentCity: Yup.string()
      .required('Required'),
    // permanentAddressProof: Yup.required('Required'),
    emergencyContactName: Yup.string()
      .required('Required'),
    emergencyContactMobile: Yup.string()
      .required('Required'),
    emergencyContactRelationship: Yup.string()
      .required('Required'),
    hireDate: Yup.date().required("Required"),
    picture: Yup.required("Required")
    
     
  });
